import requests

API_KEY="5504d8b699a388f79c168fcc87952906"
BASE_URL="http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather"

city=input("Enter the city for which you want to check the weather: ")

requests_url= f"{BASE_URL}?appid={API_KEY}&q={city}"
response= requests.get(requests_url)

if response.status_code==200:
    data= response.json()
    print(data)
else:
    print(f"Database dosen't have the information for the {city} city.")
